title: Vyprávěj
overview: Vyprávěj is a Czech television retroseries. The story takes place in Czechoslovakia (later Czech Republic) and is set in real historical events that influence the stories of the individual characters. The authors evoke the atmosphere of the time with excerpts from contemporary Czechoslovak newsreels with original commentaries, or a new historicizing commentary by Vladimír Fišer, or period music. The story is accompanied by the voice of the narrator, which was lent to the project by actor Vojtěch Kotek and then Matěj Hádek. The series was a great success, one of the most successful projects of Czech Television and is regularly repeated.
